entity.name: freeOrderProduct
entity.query: SELECT fp.id,fo.id AS free_order_id,fo.parent_id AS fo_parent_id,fo.category_id,fo.company_id, COALESCE(vp.name_en,p.name_en) AS product_name_en,COALESCE(vp.name_ru,p.name_ru) AS product_name_ru,COALESCE(vp.name_cn,p.name_cn) AS product_name_cn, COALESCE(vpc.id,pc.id) AS product_country_id,COALESCE(vpc.name_en,pc.name_en) AS country_name_en,COALESCE(vpc.name_ru,pc.name_ru) AS country_name_ru,COALESCE(vpc.name_cn,pc.name_cn) AS country_name_cn, pm.id AS pm_id,COALESCE(vp.product_manufacturer,pm.name_en) AS pm_name_en,COALESCE(vp.product_manufacturer,pm.name_ru) AS pm_name_ru,COALESCE(vp.product_manufacturer,pm.name_cn) AS pm_name_cn, COALESCE(vp.payment_option_id,p.payment_option_id) AS product_po_id FROM free_products fp LEFT JOIN free_orders fo ON fo.id = fp.free_orders_id LEFT JOIN virtual_products vp ON vp.id = fp.virtual_product_id LEFT JOIN countries vpc ON vpc.id = vp.country_id LEFT JOIN products p ON p.id = fp.product_id LEFT JOIN countries pc ON pc.id = p.country_id LEFT JOIN product_manufacturers pm ON pm.id = p.product_manufacturer_id WHERE fo.proposal_free_order_id IS NULL
